name: dnd-character-manager
description: D&D 2024 Character Management PWA with Firebase

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.build:staging: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build:staging --workspace=frontend
scripts.build:production: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build:production --workspace=frontend
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && firebase use production && firebase deploy
